definition: an American country dance which starts with the couples facing each other in two lines, wind onto or off a reel
details:
noun
- an American country dance which starts with the couples facing each other in two lines
- a lively dance of Scottish Highlanders
- a winder around which thread or tape or film or other flexible materials can be wound
= synonyms: bobbin, spool
- winder consisting of a revolving spool with a handle
- a roll of photographic film holding a series of frames to be projected by a movie projector
- music composed for dancing a reel
verb
- wind onto or off a reel
- walk as if unable to control one's movements
= synonyms: lurch
- revolve quickly and repeatedly around one's own axis
= synonyms: spin
